name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and fill the glass with ice. Top up with soda water and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Gin and Tonic
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, pour in gin, and top with tonic water.

name: Margarita
instructions: Rub the rim of a glass with lime and dip in salt. Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice, then strain into the glass.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar with bitters in a glass. Add whiskey and ice cubes, stirring gently. Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and sugar syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with lime.

name: Pina Colada
instructions: Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice until smooth. Serve in a tall glass and garnish with pineapple.

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a glass. Garnish with a cherry or lemon slice.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass with ice. Stir well and garnish with celery or a lemon wedge.

name: Mai Tai
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and lime slice.
